import React, {useState, useRef} from 'react' import PageTitle from '../../components/layout/PageTitle' import SectionTitle from '../../components/layout/SectionTitle' const UseRef = props => { const [value1, setValue1] = useState("") const count = useRef(0) useEffect(function(){ count.current = count.current + 1 },value1) count.current = count.current + 1 return (
Valor: {value1} [ {count.current} ]
setValue1(e.target.value)} />
) } export default UseRef
